INNER_RULE.DESCRIPTION: This rule identifies an EC2 instance that is communicating, or is meant to communicate, to the outer network based on existence of a public IP address for that endpoint.
INNER_RULE.NAME: AWS EC2 Internet Facing Instance

INNER_RULE.DESCRIPTION: This rule identifies an EC2 instance that is communicating, or is meant to communicate, to the outer network based on existence of a public IP address for that endpoint.
INNER_RULE.NAME: AWS EC2 With Public IP

PARAM.NAME: short_description
PARAM.VALUE: AWS Cloud Instance [{aws_instance_name}] Public Interface Violation. Incident is created by the Forescout platform.

PARAM.NAME: description

INNER_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Edit this rule to define all known and allowed Amazon Machine Images. An endpoing whose AMI is not found among those defined will be classified as having Unauthorized AMI.
INNER_RULE.NAME: Unauthorized AMI

PARAM.NAME: message
subject
PARAM.VALUE: CounterACT AWS: Instance {ip} has unauthorized AMI

HOST_PROPERTY_LIST.DESCRIPTION: A whitelist of dummy AMI IDs; change this to contain authorized AMIs.
HOST_PROPERTY_LIST.NAME: Authorized AMIs
